meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>isolate</kanji> this <kanji>month</kanji> from next month, and then do that over and over again, you'll be looking at <vocabulary>every other month</vocabulary> isolated from the other months.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
